paragraph.text: During the last 10 years I have studied several different areas of design. I love the process of converting a design into an actual product. I believe a good website should be user-friendly.
I build component based websites. In this way a website is build to last. I take care that a website is accesible for a wide set of audience.

I build websites from scratch or with popular frameworks like bootstrap and foundation for to work faster. If nexeded a CMS can be added to the website. I work with programs like Wordpress or Silverstripe.
